Goal Representation: ['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt_in_machine(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve is_off(washing_machine)
        achieve open(washing_machine)
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        achieve is_off(washing_machine)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        wash_shirt_in_machine(shirt, washing_machine)
